name: Gunning Around
description:
W, A, S, D - Movement

Click to Shoot

Space to Dash/Roll (Invincible whilst doing so)

Tab to Switch Weapons (if you have other weapons)

P to Pause

In this very classic-feeling dungeon runner, plow through numerous rooms filled entirely of enemies, obstacles, loot, or maybe an assortment of the three to reach the final boss!! Can you save all of your friends on the way??

Made for the Secret Santa Jam 2020. game currently consists of 3 floors of increasing difficulty and 1 boss fight!
